sql.where: 1=1 AND plant_activity.user_id = #{userId} AND plant_activity.plant_tiyan_amount = #{plantTiyan_amount} AND plant_activity.plant_reward_amount = #{plantReward_amount} AND plant_activity.plant_sharetime = #{plantSharetime} AND plant_activity.plant_planttime = #{plantPlanttime} AND plant_activity.plant_harvesttime = #{plantHarvesttime} AND plant_activity.plant_harvest_operate_time = #{plantHarvest_operate_time} AND plant_activity.plant_creattime = #{plantCreattime} AND plant_activity.plant_modifytime = #{plantModifytime}

1=1 AND user_id = #{userId} AND plant_tiyan_amount = #{plantTiyan_amount} AND plant_reward_amount = #{plantReward_amount} AND plant_sharetime = #{plantSharetime} AND plant_planttime = #{plantPlanttime} AND plant_harvesttime = #{plantHarvesttime} AND plant_harvest_operate_time = #{plantHarvest_operate_time} AND plant_creattime = #{plantCreattime} AND plant_modifytime = #{plantModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_plant_activity AS plant_activity

SELECT plant_activity.user_id as userId, plant_activity.plant_tiyan_amount as plantTiyan_amount, plant_activity.plant_reward_amount as plantReward_amount, plant_activity.plant_sharetime as plantSharetime, plant_activity.plant_planttime as plantPlanttime, plant_activity.plant_harvesttime as plantHarvesttime, plant_activity.plant_harvest_operate_time as plantHarvest_operate_time, plant_activity.plant_creattime as plantCreattime, plant_activity.plant_modifytime as plantModifytime FROM dr_plant_activity AS plant_activity WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT plant_activity.user_id as userId, plant_activity.plant_tiyan_amount as plantTiyan_amount, plant_activity.plant_reward_amount as plantReward_amount, plant_activity.plant_sharetime as plantSharetime, plant_activity.plant_planttime as plantPlanttime, plant_activity.plant_harvesttime as plantHarvesttime, plant_activity.plant_harvest_operate_time as plantHarvest_operate_time, plant_activity.plant_creattime as plantCreattime, plant_activity.plant_modifytime as plantModifytime FROM dr_plant_activity AS plant_activity
${orderby}
